short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Patch Wallet browser extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Patch Wallet is an extension for overlaying web3 actions on top of any website to add a value & financial layer to all of the Internet. This is a "patch" for what Marc Andreessen called the "orginal sin of the web"....not having a native financial system.

We stopped waiting for "web3 adoption" on every site and started enabling web3 actions on any website by default. With Patch, everyone already has a wallet and you can start sending them tokens, NFTs, airdrops, and attestations today.

Patch currently supports tipping and NFT gifting on Twitter and Warpcast as well as a registry for anyone to add web3 actions to any site.
